projects.title: Chronic Kidney Disease Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict chronic kidney disease using patient health indicators. Achieved high accuracy through data preprocessing, feature selection, and model optimization.

projects.title: Power Outages Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed major power outage events in the U.S. from 2000 to 2016. Conducted data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, and predictive modeling to understand outage patterns and their impacts.

projects.title: House Evaluation
projects.description: Created a web application to evaluate house prices using data from over 2 million U.S. homes. Implemented regression models and geodemographic analysis for accurate price predictions.

projects.title: Drug Consumption Study
projects.description: Investigated correlations between demographic factors and drug consumption patterns. Utilized machine learning classification techniques to identify key predictors of substance use.

projects.title: Surfance Temperature Anomalies
projects.description: This project explores how visual design choices can shape public perception of climate data, and blurs the line between persuasion and deception. Focusing on global surface temperature anomalies from 1961â€“2024.
